**Example 1: 会员充值**

会员充值

Input: 

```
tccli yinsuda RechargeVip --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --AppName mtest_James \
    --UserId 123 \
    --RoomId 908 \
    --VipDays 31 \
    --AnchorId 123
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "CreateTime": "2023-11-27 20:21:33",
        "OrderNo": "11258768abf2dc9b05021467e",
        "PartnerNo": "fs",
        "RequestId": "f09060bf-d902-4bfc-a2e2-531c3214b371"
    }
}
```
